# goToNextPage(_:)

**Instance Method**

Navigates to the next page of the document.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBAction @MainActor func goToNextPage(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Discussion

PDF Kit records the move in its page history.

## Related Documentation

- **canGoToNextPage**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the user can navigate to the next page of the document.

## Navigating History for a Document

- **goBack(_:)**: Navigates back one step in the page history.
- **goForward(_:)**: Navigates forward one step in the page history.
- **goToFirstPage(_:)**: Navigates to the first page of the document.
- **goToLastPage(_:)**: Navigates to the last page of the document.
- **goToPreviousPage(_:)**: Navigates to the previous page of the document.
